thread.title: Emotional moment teenager is reunited with family after being 'snatched from Las Vegas hotel by sex traffickers'
thread.title_full: Emotional moment teenager is reunited with family after being 'snatched from Las Vegas hotel by sex traffickers' - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Emotional moment teenager is reunited with family after being 'snatched from Las Vegas hotel by sex traffickers'
text:
Emotional moment teenager is reunited with family after being 'snatched from Las Vegas hotel by sex traffickers' Sarah Dunsey was rescued by the FBI on Friday after disappearing from the MGM Grand Hotel more than a month ago   Share By Scarlet Howes 21:45, 20 FEB 2017 News Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Girl goes on furious rant at taxi driver Watch this video again Watch Next Incredible moment truck falls through frozen lake 1:25 Is swinging cheating? 0:38 Horror footage shows man get hit by car twice whi 0:30 CCTV released of Sehwan suicide bomber sneaking p 0:33 Two passengers thrown from car as it rolls down e 0:47 Putin's forces carry out major Cold War training 1:33 Man survives plunging almost 100 feet down sheer 0:46 Coronation Street fans slam Leanne very quick bir 0:42 One of the gruesome scenes from Anatomy Lab Live 0:24 Attack on cafes in Istanbul 1:02 Best placards as thousands protests Donald Trump' 0:38 Alan Shearer recalls playing with Sutton's Wayne 0:34 Pensioners fight off screwdriver-wielding thug 0:33 Video will play in  Moment 'snatched girl' is reunited with her family Share this video Watch Next   Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email This is the emotional moment a 17-year-old girl allegedly abducted by sex traffickers is reunited with her family more than a month after she vanished from a Las Vegas hotel.
Sarah Dunsey was rescued by the FBI in California on Friday after disappearing from the MGM Grand Hotel while holidaying with friends.
In the video, which was posted on the missing person's page, she can be seen embracing her brothers.
It was accompanied by the comment:"Sibling love. It was an emotional reunion last night!"
In a photograph shared on Sunday, the teenager from Logan, Utah, appeared smiling and without any facial injuries as she was reunited with her father and stepmother.
Read More Rotherham sex abuse victim who was pregnant at 12 says her child is a 'product of pure evil' In the video, which was posted on the missing person's page, Sarah can be seen embracing brothers (Photo: Facebook) "Feels so amazing to hold this beautiful young lady in our arms again!! Thanks again to everyone," Terri Dunsey, the teen's stepmother, told Facebook friends. 
Her stepfather Todd said on Monday it was a "miracle she was back with the family alive, and they were all "exhausted" after what had happened to her.
He told the Dailymail.com : "No parent or child should have to experience what we have been through. We are thankful for all the good people that helped in the recover of Sarah. This was truly a miracle." 
Emotional reunion with mum and Sarah after she vanished for over a month (Photo: Facebook) Sarah has a four stepbrothers and a full brother and sister.
She lives with her mother and her stepfather Todd Ellis in St George, Utah.
Her father Michael lives in Logan with his wife Terri and her two children.
The family launched a widely-shared social media campaign to find Sarah last week after she went missing on January 15.
Sarah was rescued by the FBI in California on Friday after disappearing from the MGM Grand Hotel (Photo: Facebook) Sarah was found with two men at a hotel in Venice, and they have been questioned by police.
The FBI have not confirmed she was taken in connection with human sex trafficking.
Cops have refused to say whether there have been any arrests in relation to her disappearance.
Read More 'I was a sex slave and forced to perform in child sex abuse videos aged 10 by my own FAMILY' Sarah with mum who is adamant that teen was trafficked for sex work (Photo: Facebook) When she disappearance, her mother Amie made a video plea to her daughter, telling her to “fight” the mysterious sex traffickers who the family feared kidnapped her. 
Police are yet to make any suggestion over the circumstances surrounding the case but Sarah's family are adamant in their belief she was trafficked for sex work.
